an4.208:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti …pe… micchāñāṇī hoti, micchāvimutti hoti.
an4.208:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā ca micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca micchādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti …pe… attanā ca micchāñāṇī hoti, parañca micchāñāṇe samādapeti;
an4.208:3.3: attanā ca micchāvimutti hoti, parañca micchāvimuttiyā samādapeti.
an4.208:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko hoti …pe… sammāñāṇī hoti, sammāvimutti hoti.
an4.208:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā ca sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca sammādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti …pe… attanā ca sammāñāṇī hoti, parañca sammāñāṇe samādapeti;
an4.208:5.3: attanā ca sammāvimutti hoti, parañca sammāvimuttiyā samādapeti.
